item.title: trans living archive
item.description: trans living archive is a film and archival project capturing lived experience of trans people of color. the project is ongoing. trans living archive (v1.8)

item.title: for maria
item.description: “for maria” is a short film exploring fragmented memories of a relationship. “for maria” sample 1 “for maria” sample 2
